title: Why Dragons Hide
description: To rise through the ranks of an ancient military order, magic-wielding students are pitted against each other in vicious survival matches.Sixteen-year-old Kyra dreams of making it to the top, but on her final trial she's teamed up with a mysterious student who isn't what he appears to be. Amidst the chaos and bloodshed, they must find a way to survive while preventing a great evil from finding its way back into the world.
author: Cameron M. Hayden
